thread.title: Real Madrid reignite David de Gea interest
thread.title_full: Real Madrid reignite David de Gea interest

author: Okogba
title: Real Madrid reignite David de Gea interest
text:
Home » Sports » Real Madrid reignite David de Gea interest Real Madrid reignite David de Gea interest On 8:57 pm In Sports by Okogba Comments 
Manchester United goalkeeper David de Gea is one of a number of stand-out Premier League goalkeepers being targeted by Real Madrid, according to reports. 
The Daily Telegraph say Madrid are in the market for a new keeper, with De Gea, Chelsea’s Thibaut Courtois and Tottenham’s Hugo Lloris all being considered as replacements for Keylor Navas. David DeGea 
De Gea is currently on £200,000 a week at Old Trafford but sixth-placed United are again facing a battle to qualify for next season’s Champions League – a battle that, if they lose, will encourage Madrid to swoop for the Spain international. 
United’s No 1 almost joined Madrid on deadline day in the summer of 2015 but a broken fax machine scuppered the move. 
Madrid are currently serving a transfer ban but that will expire at the end of this season. Okogba
